50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Amr that:The Prophet [SAW] used to seek refuge (with Allah) from four things: From knowledge that is of no benefit, from a heart that does not feel humble, from a supplication that is not heard, and a soul that is never satisfied

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِعَاذَةِ مِنْ قَلْبٍ لاَ يَخْشَعُ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge With Allah From a Heart That Does Not Feel Humble
